attributes.action: We want King Charles to step in and sack his government as soon as possible.
attributes.additional_details:
I want this to happen because the current Prime Minister has absolutely no clue what the people of our great country want. All they do is blame everyone else apart from his own government.
They take no responsibility for the dire straights the country is in and how unhappy the great people of our country feel.
attributes.background: As King Charles is head of our Government we the signed call on him to dissolve this Government and force an early election.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.
